page.title: 01General Introduction
page.content: The overall impression that a visitor would leave our area with would be one of contrast.Large areas are predominantly grass,farms and woodland ,with isolated farms scattered throughout.Pockets of older mining communities are being absorbed by expanding{residential areas and new industries.Much of this change has been brought about by the M1.Spoiled land from mining and {industrial}dereliction is agricultural and recreational activities.Industrial and mining eyesores are less obvious because of thoughtful locations, healthy interest in enviromental health and conservation. It is hoped that new industries will be attracted to the area to counteract the present high level of unemployment and the effects of National Coal Board rationalisation plans.
